author: Lucy Gilmour
title: Pyongyang Express: A History of North Korea’s Train Diplomacy
text:
Three generations of North Korea’s leaders have shared a fondness for train travel. Kim Jong Un’s trip to Beijing this week—kept under wraps until he had returned—was by rail, tracing a path that his father and grandfather had followed before him.
The trip to the Chinese capital, during which he met Chinese President Xi Jinping, was Mr.... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
